profile:
The Home Improvement People have completed literally thousands of renovations since our inception. We are a unique award winning contracting company, consulted by various media as industry experts. 
Please view our website at homeimprovementpeople.com to view images of some of our projects. 
For our clients' convenience, we've implemented progress billing as well as financing.
Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship.
 
Our projects range from remodelled bathrooms and kitchens, to rear additions,  hardwood flooring, basements, second story additions and other extensive renovations. We undertake work in all budget ranges.
 
Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation. From plans and permits, to last little finishing details, The Home Improvement People is committed to completing your renovations and home improvements in a professional manner and to your complete satisfaction.
We take pride in our personalized service and our high quality workmanship. 
Call us for quality, insured work - completed on time, and on budget.
416-782-7605.

profile:
P&P General Contractors Inc. is a family owned and operated business with excellent references provided by many satisfied customers.  With more than 15 years of experience and many satisfied customers our company is strongly committed to provide high quality of craftsmanship to each and every customer.

P & P General Contractors Inc. is a licensed company and for our customer's protection we carry both liability and worker's compensation insurance on all our workers and subcontractors.  We are a start to finish company and we stand behind all projects performed and backs them with a full 1 YEAR WARRANTY.

We take pride in our perform, thus our customers can always be assured that only the most experienced and qualified people are serving them.  Our top priority is our customers satisfaction and our teams objective is to transform your renovation wish list into a reality.

AGM Renovations experts provide quality basement and Bathroom Renovation services throughout the GTA and the surrounding area. See our Service Area for the complete list of towns where our  renovation services are offered. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and offer competitive prices with exceptional quality.

Expect more and when you need the best; trust AGM Renovations. We guarantee that you will be completely satisfied, which means that you don't pay until you are satisfied.
Our mission is to be committed to excel in the work we do. We are committed to excel and maintain a sense of pride in our all we do!

services:
AGM Renovations offers Complete basement and Bathroom renovations packages from the professional design through the professional cleaning including:

Drywall- We employ only professional drywall installers and our goal is deliver complete satisfaction to each and every client with the quality of our workmanship and our prompt, reliable service.
    
Taping- Our drywall taping techniques will bring a high quality smooth finish, with a level of excellence you will take pride in.

Painting- We include all wall priming, painting of ceilings, baseboards, casing, crown and cove moldings into our basement construction packages
    
High Grade Laminate Flooring- is standard in our basement renovations packages.

Tiling- Shower, bathroom, or kitchenette tiling will be done by professional tile installers who are employed directly by AGM. A 2 year unlimited warranty is provided to you standard when you finish your basement with AGM
   
Plumbing- Our licensed plumbers will ensure that no problem is left unsolved and you can be sure that any drain or other plumbing defects left by the original house builder will be fixed effectively.

Electrical- We are committed to providing fully licensed electrician service as part of our standard package. Should you ever require an electrical certificate when you decide to sell your property, we will be happy to provide it to you

profile:
Timeless in style, dependable in performance and exceptional in design, look to Rockstella Stonery to craft the perfect granite, marble or quartz countertop for your home or office. A natural option for kitchen countertops, bathroom vanities and tub surrounds, these materials are also excellent alternatives for fireplaces, bar tops, reception desks and more. We handle all aspects of design, fabrication and installation, and are always prepared to take on a variety of projects, from single vanities to full-scale home installs to multi-unit projects.

***

We distinguish the caliber of our work at Rockstella not just through outstanding craftsmanship and affordable pricing, but more importantly, through an unparalleled level of service. We’ve earned a reputation for being timely, approachable and efficient, and we always plan our consults and installs at a time that suits your schedule – whether it’s business hours, weekends or after hours. It also bears pointing out that we work directly with you – there are no sub-contractors involved – from on-site measuring to individual slab selection to professional installation.

***

At Rockstella Stonery, we like to refer to the unique style and design of our stone options as affordable luxury – an option that will stand out in your home or place of work and that will endure for ages. We’re based in Stoney Creek, and are ready to provide our services to clients throughout Hamilton, Niagara region and GTA.

profile:
Techno Kitchen Refacing is an Ontario based kitchen renovation company that specializes in refacing, rather than replacing. Recently, we brought on another member to the team to supply the increasing demand. Now, we can serve you faster, and across a larger area.

Techno's word-of-mouth marketing philosophy shows how happy customers have been with the product. Honesty and customer satisfaction are of the utmost concern for Techno and the customer will benefit every time.

Want to see it for yourself? Our customers are so happy and enthusiastic about the work that they've allowed us to invite you into their homes to see firsthand the quality of the work. Call today and ask how to arrange a meeting with Frank.
service_area: Stoney Creek, Hamilton, Grimsby, St. Catherine's, Niagara, Welland, Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Georgetown, Halton Hills, Caledon, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Etobicoke, Scarborough, North York, Markham, Ajax, Pickering, Richmond Hill, Oshawa, Vaughan, Woodbridge, Barrie, Muskoka, Kitchener, Cambridge, Waterloo, Guelph, Ayr, Orangeville, Flamborough, Waterdown
hours: Tuesday to Friday 10 am - 5 pm Saturday 10 am - 4 pm
products:
Why Choose Techno?
Full Satisfaction Guarantee! Real wood doors and veneer in several different stains, colors and species! No plastic, no paper, no cheap looking laminate! We're a member of the Better Business Bureau! You work directly with the owner who will be personally involved in making your dream kitchen a reality!
services: Cabinet repainting, cabinet refacing and custom-built cabinetry and entertainment units.
specialities:
*WE SPECIALIZE IN REAL WOOD*
After 15 years of experience in the woodworking and cabinetry industry, Techno founder Frank Silletti chose to start his own refacing company with the goal of giving homeowners in Ontario a more affordable alternative to traditional kitchen remodeling. Frank says "By using the cabinet refacing process, we are able to dramatically cut down the time, cost and inconvenience of building and creating your dream kitchen". With the experience and the motivation to back his work, you can be sure Frank will be there to answer any questions or concerns to deliver the best value and quality of work available. Please feel free to visit the contact page and fill out an information request form. We look forward to hearing from you!

profile:
If you want QUALITY, CREATIVITY, RELIABILITY, and an overall ENJOYABLE experience, Purple Properties is the company you're looking for! For nearly 24 years now we have grown to understand what is needed in our market space, now allowing us to service happy clients all over the GTA.  

We have enjoyed producing an impressive body of work, lead by the Vision of our clients. The results naturally happen based on our core principles of PASSION, EXCELLENCE, & COMMITMENT. Our work and knowledge base is extremely diverse. We love to use STONE, HORTICULTURE, WOOD, TILES,  PAINTS along with other materials that become our art, your property being the canvas. Whether your project is interior or exterior, we can help! We look forward to co-creating with you in your next project! 

Purple Properties is fully licensed, insured, and up to date with WSIB. Our insurance and license are valid in the GTA for Interior and exterior projects.

profile:
For 25 years, Canlik has been the premier Kitchen Refacing Specialist in Greater Toronto Area. It's kitchen upgrade solutions are custom to fit individual family needs, New Kitchens or Refacing Kitchens, they are more personal, flexible, affordable and environmental friendly. Since 1990, Canlik’s principal has been the same – delivering high quality products and services. No pushy sales. Consultants focus on providing honest and unbiased suggestions so that home owners can make the right decisions. Kitchen projects can be overwhelming and confusing – but it does not have to be if customers chose Canlik Kitchens. 
 
Details on our solutions: - 
 
(A) Kitchen Refacing,
Canlik’s very popular "Premier Kitchen Refacing” aims at delivering custom kitchen looks with fraction of the cost. It uses the existing infrastructure and replaces exterior elements, like the cabinet doors, gable and fillers. It reduces wastage and helps avoid hidden costs. Kitchen Refacing solution has been providing great alternatives for those who want to achieve their renovation goals with less effort, less risk and have their budget under control.
 
(B) Custom New Kitchens 
“Canlik Custom Kitchens” allow home owners fully utilize limited spaces because cabinets are custom built to fit spaces. It can handle challenging space issues that "Modular kitchens" can hardly address. It also makes preserving the existing layouts and the foot prints possible, so that the flooring and other elements are not affected. Storage efficiency is achieved by detail oriented cabinet configurations design and adding effective accessories, if necessary.

profile:
Home Additions Builders Basement Renovation Kitchen Planning & Renovation General Contractors 

At Oborne Contracting we pride ourselves on customer service. We specialize in additions, kitchens, bathrooms, basements, and all other home renovation and remodeling needs. Our team is courteous, skilled, conscientious and determined to ensure each project is completed on time and on budget. Our longstanding trades are reliable professionals who are committed to their work and quality. We are confident that you will find at Oborne Contracting we conduct ourselves on a highly professional level, assuring your complete satisfaction is our key to success.Oborne Contracting Inc. has been servicing Toronto and surrounding area home owners for over 20 years. We specialize in custom home building, general contracting, home repairs, design and build, home remodeling and restoration, home additions and basement renovations. 
We take pride in attending to every detail of any project we take on, from the initial meeting with the discerning home owner until after the job is completed. After working with our professional staff you will understand why Oborne Contracting Inc. will be your first choice for all of your home upgrades, renovations and new constructions.

Each home remodeling project is unique in the level of complexity and requirements. This demands a level of experience to design a broad plan and turn any project into a functional and livable home upgrade, addition or custom design. We build our client’s trust by understanding their needs, budgets, time frames, while supervising every step of the construction process. No question is ever left unanswered.

profile:
Valentini Kitchens has been building and renovating Quality Kitchens and Cabinetry since 1974 to the Toronto and surrounding GTA markets. 
Valentini Kitchens is a true "Family Business" that has been owned and operated by the Pasquariello Family for over 45 years. 
Valentini was founded in 1974 by the late Mike Pasquariello and is now run by his 3 sons, Tony, Piero and Marco. 
We at Valentini Kitchens have maintained a high quality standard and reputation from our first day in business, with our attention to detail and service to our customer as our # 1 motive.
 
Today, we have made changes to our business to compete with our changing markets and with our changes we will maintain our quality and service to make sure our clients are 100% satisfied. We have also implemented a few more cost effective lines of Cabinetry, many that are locally sourced and a few off shore lines to meet the changing markets and cost budgets of our clientele.
 
Valentini Kitchens offers Cabinetry in many options to fit your needs and budget:
- Full custom made line of Kitchen, Bath and various types of Cabinetry and Mill Work.
- Semi custom made locally sourced and branded line of Kitchen, Bath, Laundry & Closet Cabinetry.
- Semi custom made off shore sourced and branded line of Kitchen and Bath Cabinetry.

  
Full line of custom made Residential Cabinetry Options including: 
- Kitchens and Bath Cabinetry
- TV, Entertainment and Wall Unit Cabinetry
- Bar and Built In Cabinetry
- Laundry & Mud Room Cabinetry
- Home Office Cabinetry
- Closet Organizers and Home Storage Solutions



Full line of custom made Commercial / Industrial Cabinetry Options including:
- Office Kitchen & Bath Cabinetry 
- Custom Cabinetry for Restaurants, Bars, Coffee Houses, Hair Salon / Spas, Dental and Doctor Offices, etc.

 
When you purchase a service from Valentini, you are buying into a family that has a reputation of giving our customers 100% of Quality, Service and most importantly Price.
Being one of a handful of the GTA'S Cabinetry Pioneers, Valentini is small in size but is evolving with the everyday changes in the world of Woodworking and Full Home Renovations.
Valentini offers a true complete "1 Stop" shopping experience by providing customers with full Renovation capabilities. We can start with an in home or in showroom consultation and the rest is up to the customer. Valentini can take care of full project management from start to completion. We offer a full range of Renovations to complete selection of Retail Products.
What makes us at Valentini Kitchens Unique is that we are one of the only companies that allows consumers to purchase everything directly from us for use on their Home Renovations, meaning "We Install Everything We Sell". By supplying the retail products we sell, we can insure you as the home owner full warranties of the products we use on the job and also "Less Time" having to run around to have all the products ready on the job site. We take care of showing you the products in our own Kitchens and Bath Showroom and the delivery of everything to your home when it is needed for the Renovation.

 
Valentini also offers a full list of Retail Showroom Products including: 
- Premade Bath Vanity Cabinetry
- Tile, Stone and Mosaics
- Hardwood, Vinyl, Laminate and Carpet Flooring
- Quartz, Granite, Marble and Laminate Counter Tops
- Plumbing Fixtures
 



As many companies grow in size, we at Valentini Kitchens want to remain small in size with our 1 Factory Showroom Location, we pride ourselves in maintaining our high standards of Quality, Service and Reputation that has made is one of the leaders in the Kitchen and Renovation Industry for over 4 decades. As a family business, we offer the ultimate hands on approach with any project we take on.

Valentini offers a 1 hour "In home" or "In Showroom" free Estimate Consultation (By Appointment only).
Please Call or Email us with your inquiries today. (Please leave a voice mail message or email us if we are not able to respond the same day as we may be on the job site, We will definitely respond back to everyone that contacts us as soon as possible ). 

Valentini Kitchens and the Pasquariello Family had its own hot reality TV series called "Building Family" in 2005 on HGTV Canada. This series aired weekly nationwide with a total of 6 half hour episodes. Please click here on the Homestars Valentini Kitchens Video Galleries to watch the episodes and to read up more on this, please visit our website. 
 
We hope all of our past and future customers enjoy watching this show as it shows the everyday life of our family business working together in the real world of Kitchen Manufacturing and Home Renovations with a flare of true reality in our day to day activities.

profile:
Since 1973 Olympic Kitchens Inc has been a family run business providing timeless cabinetry for custom dream home builds and home renovation projects.  At the center of these projects is always a stunning kitchen but we bring our expertise and quality to built-ins, bathrooms and specialty millwork. 

Now that you’re thinking about a new kitchen, you certainly want the breathtaking results you may have seen online and in pictures. But a truly beautiful kitchen is more than skin deep. Real value for your investment includes things like classic styling that will stand the test of time. A company that understands and can deliver current trends and advanced products. Flexibility that lets you put your personal stamp on your own kitchen design. Hand crafted cabinets that look as good up close as they do from a distance. Durable surfaces that stand up to repeated cleaning. 
 Functionality that makes things easy to store – and easy to find.

We’re proud to say that Olympic Kitchens Inc. can offer you all these things, and more. We’ve learned a thing or two over 45 years of building custom cabinetry. Most important, we’ve learned that true satisfaction with a kitchen occurs on many levels – and ¬that each level must be addressed right from the beginning to ensure it exceeds expectations. Our clients include custom home builders, architects, interior designers and renovation contractors who understand ﬁne work, and who recommend us to families like yours.

Services Provided
Custom Bathroom Vanities, Custom Cabinet Doors, Custom Cabinets, Custom Kitchen Cabinets, Custom Walk-in Closets, Drafting, Floor Plans, Green Building, Home Additions, Home Extensions, Kitchen Design, Lighting Design, Sustainable Design, Kitchen Remodeling

profile:
Dear  Customers, Dear Friends
 
Thank you very much for your support, warm feedbacks and all references that we are getting from you. 
We are here to serve you and will gladly accept the opportunity to exceed your expectations. We are so passionate about the quality of our work and the treatment of our customers, we want you to know just what you can expect when you buy your marble or granite counter tops from Marble Treasure.
 
    The reason we are in business is to serve you.
    Your concerns, needs and desires are our top priority.
    You are not dependent on us; we are dependent on you.
    Your inquiries are not an interruption of our work; they are the reason for it.
    You do us a favor when you call and we feel privileged to serve you.
    You represent an integral part of our business; just like our staff.
    You tell us what you want and we will strive to fulfill that want.
    You are the client. It is not our place to argue with you but to see that you are satisfied.
    You are deserving of the most courteous and attentive treatment we can provide.
    You are our lifeblood. We exist to exceed your expectations.
 
Sincerely,
 
Marble Treasure Inc Team
 
 
Showroom hours:
 
Monday –Thursday 10am-7pm
Friday from 10am-6pm and Sat from 10am-4pm
Sunday closed

profile:
Why choose The Renovators of Canada?  
 
For over the past 20 years our focus on customer experience has helped The Renovators of Canada grow to locations in Durham, Aurora, Stouffville, Markham, Vaughan, Toronto, Hamilton, Guelph, Kitchener, Waterloo, Barrie, Oshawa, Oakville and Cambridge. 
 
Unique to the industry, The Renovators of Canada provides a 10 year warranty on all craftsmanship. This home renovation warranty protection was established to provide peace of mind as home and business owners contemplate renovating a personal or commercial space. 
 
T-ROC is a fully licensed and insured including WSIB. Other affiliations include memberships with the National Kitchen and Bath Association, CARAHS, Better Business Bureau.  
 
We have a proven track record working with our customers with full transparency in every aspect of your project.  Can’t be present all the time during the renovation process?  No worries, we have specialized client software that allows you to see the entire schedule and pictures as the project happens in real time. We care for your home like it’s our own and always conduct ourselves respectfully and professionally.  
 
With our motivated and innovative professionals we will transform your house and make your dream home a reality.  Visit our website at www.trocanada.com

profile:
RM Renovation is a Toronto based renovation company with more than 20 years experience in the field.
.
WE ARE THE TEAM OF PROFESSIONALS WHO PERFORM KITCHEN, BATH OR BASEMENT RENOVATIONS ACCORDING TO YOUR PERSONAL PROJECT.
.
Our major activities are renovating basements, kitchens and bathrooms at reasonable prices. Trusting such works to us our clients have convinced in their quality and fast performing. We provide high-quality construction and renovation services as well as give maximum guarantee for our services. Depending on the project we perform our interior design, wall insulation and finishing.

Our advantages:

Quality and efficiency. We provide preparing and performing works as soon as possible.
Years of experience. We are in the renovation services market for many years and have an excellent reputation and hundreds of grateful customers.
Individual approach. We approach responsibly to perform each order and find the best options for the task as well as advise customers in order to meet all their individual needs.
Highly qualified specialists. We are a team of professionals and perform our work efficiently and reliably. Our employees keep their skills always according to the up to date requirements.
Customers positive reviews. We have a lot of positive feedback from the customers.
.
.
Basement renovation:

Basement in a private house more often perceived as a technical room: storeroom for garden tools or a cellar to store the harvest. Meanwhile, the basement is easy can turn into a full room to organize here, for example, a vinotheque, bar, home theatre or billiard room. The kitchen in the basement is also becoming a very popular modern solution. Construction and repair of the basement or ground floor, of course, will transform your home by adding not only the living space but also personality.

The following work can be done during the basement renovation.

Waterproofing. This is necessary if the moisture on the room walls revealed.

Heating. If the room is designed for staying long (kitchen, library, bathroom), it should be warm enough in any case.

Thermal insulation. This feature will save on heating and prevent heat loss into the ground and it will greatly enhance the energy efficiency of the whole building.

Lighting. If the basement has a small level above the soil it can be equipped with energy-saving windows. Additional electric light point sources using LED lamps will be created as well.

Soundproofing will be installed if the basement room contains equipment that generates big noise (e.g. water pumps etc.).

Water supply and sewerage. These works are performed accordingly to the local water company. Additional pumps can be installed if necessary.

Networks for the power supply, LAN or television can be laid, so it will provide you with maximum comfort.
.
.
Kitchen renovation:

The kitchen is one of the most visited places in your house. That is why it is so important that this room should be cozy and functional. We will do for you all kinds of our works for any areas of the rooms, from small to large ones. These will be the following:

1. Replacing the wires.

2. Aligning the surfaces of the ceiling and walls.

3. Laying the floor and wall tiles.

4. Floor, ceiling and general kitchen equipment installation.

5. Kitchen windows replacement.

6. Home appliances integration.

We always use safe and easy to wash materials.
.
.
Bathrooms renovation:

We are trying to renovate the bathroom as soon as possible because we well know this room is essentially the most important thing in your home. This type of repair involves the following:

1. Initial preparing the room, dismounting the wires, old tiles and plumbing communications.

2. Installation of new wiring, plumbing pipes, risers.

3. Preparing the walls, floor and ceiling.

4. Installation the new door and windows.

5. Installing the tiles on the floor and walls.

6. Installation of the new ceiling and lighting.

7. Installation of new connections to the water supply and sanitation.

8. Installation of all sanitary equipment and electric wash machine if needed.

We work at any time convenient for you. We are looking forward to meeting you!
specialities: Kitchen Renovation; Bathroom Renovation; Basement Renovation; Full House Renovations

profile:
Gala Renovations was founded with the concept born out of two sound principles: client-centred design and impeccable customer service. Whether your space is wide open with room to imagine, or small and cozy where we have to be creative, we will work with you to ensure that your renovation is completed exactly the way you want it. Our process starts with the ideas and vision you have for your home and moves to our team who will create plans that will guide our craftsmen to build the home of your dreams.


We specialize in complete home, ground and second floor renovations but we also take on other projects like basements, attics, custom kitchens, bathrooms, wall units, and storage solutions. We are flexible and collaborative in our approach and we care about the details that will ultimately beautify your home. At Gala, we leave no stone unturned in the journey from concept to reality. Our passion and knowledge paired with your dwelling and vision, will culminate in a one-of-a kind, unique space that you can proudly call home!

profile:
From the year 1989 Brampton Kitchen & Cabinets Ltd. has been designing and manufacturing Custom Cabinetry, with Custom Kitchens being its flagship service. Brampton Kitchen follows a set of ethical values and professional procedures. We operate with the highest level of integrity and rigidly adhere to the policy of customer service, accountability and skill. We are a credible organization that stands behind its product. 
Extensive experience of several years and expertise of best artisans and craftsmen, we create designs that stand out. Be it your Kitchen, Bathroom, Vanity, Entertainment Unit, Bar or Walk-in Closet we have the skills to meet your every need. Our thorough knowledge of our trade is our biggest asset. We learn about your lifestyle while working alongside with you, so as to tailor your kitchen or cabinetry according to your specifications. From Planning to Designing to Manufacturing, we make sure you love every step along the way. We educate you about the industry, current trends and styles so that you make an informed decision.  We can turn your dream into reality without having to compromise on budget or quality.

At Splish Splash Bathrooms, Kitchens & More, we take pride in completing beautiful renovations with outstanding workmanship on every project. Our highly skilled crew members are Schluter Systems Certified and fully insured (including WSIB coverage). 

Bathrooms and kitchens are our specialty, so you can feel confident that your project is in good hands. If you have additional needs, we're great at other residential renovations too!

We stand by our work. After your project is complete, we're still here for you, and provide a warranty on our workmanship: free of charge. 

Contact us with your questions and to request a free in-home assessment.

Finding the perfect custom cabinetry solution for your home can feel like an endless search, and that is where we fit in and step up to the challenge.

Double T Contracting specializes in complete home remodeling and renovations. Our design and build team has helped many home owners upgrade and update their homes style to a Modern, Traditional, Contemporary or Classic look and feel. We believe each home is unique, which is why we tailor your custom home renovation project to suit your lifestyle and family needs. We can update your kitchen, bathroom or your entire house and manage the project and cost to be within your time frame and budget. 

At Double T Contracting we offer the highest craftsmanship and use quality materials in order to deliver you an exciting design with superior fit and finish, while increasing your home’s value.


Our design and build team knowledge can turn the most sophisticated and complex renovation project into reality and make the whole process enjoyable and stress free for you. Our Design and Build process allows us to work one on one with you, keeping you informed about each major step of the project from initiation to completion. 

Let us pay attention to all the details and make your dream a reality.

profile:
The kitchen is a vital component in any house to create memories, and we ensure to build a kitchen that combines both accessibility for a smooth cooking experience, and design into the space to show your taste for family and friends. Every Neo Kitchen design is ensured to represent your ideas and plans, but also integrates our designer’s knowledge-leading to a elegant and functional kitchen! Everything is custom built in house with love and profession, which is vital in the production of a unique kitchen, and this proves the dedication we have to each and every customer. Our main approach is to provide leading customer service and ensure overall satisfaction in every kitchen we manufacture to give you the most headache free kitchen renovation. 

At Neo Kitchen, we incorporate many aspects of design-like modern, antique, rustic, classic, industrial, etc. that cater to our exclusive and unique customers! The personalization of each kitchen is what makes Neo Kitchen distinctive from other kitchen manufacturers. We not only do kitchens, but also bathroom, closets, wall units, laundry rooms, etc. Every Neo Kitchen production is elegant and timeless with affordable prices.

Our work reflects hard craftsmanship, technique, and expertise which is delivered to every customer! The designer is always present when customer’s walk-in ensuring what they have in mind can come true. Discover how Neo Kitchen is the perfect fit for you-and your kitchen. We offer free consultation (measurement), and design-so while you are deciding you pay nothing.

Come on the journey with us and let Neo Kitchen show you its capability!

Established in 2013, City EdgePoint Construction Inc. offers an extensive set of renovation, repair, and home management services.  We are experts in all types of Home Additions, Kitchens, Bathrooms, Basements, and from commercial renovations to residential remodeling, we provide a comprehensive resource for the GTA.

When you decide to renovate, you need a contractor with a detailed understanding of your project.  City EdgePoint takes an innovative approach that combines high service standards with superior customer service.  We keep you informed with regular progress reports, and each of our trade partners is evaluated through an extremely strict screening process.  When you want results, you need City EdgePoint.

Visit our website for more information.  To get a quote, call us today or send us an email.

profile:
Jiang's Home Renovation Inc consists teams of true hardworking Asian employees. 

Our main values are customer satisfaction and best quality jobs.

We specialize in: 
* Full House Renovation -> approximately 2  -3 months from basement to third floor
* Full Basement renovation (From start to finish approximately 4 weeks)
* Bathroom/Kitchen Refacing (New backsplash,vanity,cabinets, counter-tops installation) 
* Ceramic, Porcelain or any other types of Tile Installation - 100% flat/level result
* Vinyl, Hardwood, Engineered wood or Laminate Flooring 
* Interior and Exterior paintings include rooms, ceilings, garage doors, windows,doors, deck and fences. 
* Crown Moulding, Drywall, concrete repairs, Gutter cleaning /windows/doors caulking or re-caulking 
* Lights/furniture dissemble and re-assemble  

***Golden Rule*** -100% customer satisfaction.

- send us a picture or two of the design you want, we will communicate, help design and work with your budgets in order to achieve expected maximum result.

We have expanded and own a crew of professional team doing exterior jobs: Backyard landscaping, New fencing, Decking, Interlocking at a very satisfactory price. 

Referrals available upon request.


Any small or big jobs, we take them seriously, give us a chance to show you that we are worth hiring.

profile:
Finding your perfect home renovation partner can understandably be a daunting process these days. With so many options and potential risks, people are looking for a partner they can trust.

That's why Royal Home Improvements (RHI) retains single-source responsibility from start to finish. Our hand's on approach ensures your needs are met, from concept to construction. Whether architectural design, the quality of construction, or our strict adherence to timelines and budget, RHI guarantees everything we do and make sure that our customers are satisfied with every facet of our work.

Building trust takes years of delivering on time and budget. It requires committed professionals and a refined process model. But ultimately, it's about respect and owning ones word. This hasn't changed since we open our doors in 1969. Proudly serving the Greater Toronto Area, Royal Home Improvements today is one of the largest multi-phased renovators in Canada.

What can we do for you?

profile:
Since 2009, Kitchen Pro had been serving GTA with fine quality and affordable custom cabinetry. We thrive in competitive custom cabinetry industry and provide the best customer service for new and existing clients. All our cabinets are custom made and sourced locally, so everything is 100% Canadian made. We provide free on-site consultation and create designs tailored to our client's needs. Kitchen Pro has created a step by step process to getting you in your dream kitchen. Kitchen Pro will ensure you receive the kitchen of your dreams with our large variety of door styles, finishes, interior selections and materials. And our rigorous standards and top quality materials will ensure your beautiful cabinets last for years. 

During the unprecedented time with outbreak of coronavirus, Kitchen Pro supports online estimation and 3D design meeting to better serve our customers. We are also launching special promotion help you save more. All customers have chance to get extra 10% off from the project and get a free hood with the promotion. For more information, please do not hesitate to contact us!

profile:
Latitude Countertops is known for producing excellent quality Natural and Engineered Stone Countertops. Our commitment to provide top notch service has made us the largest fabricator of granite & quartz counter tops in the Toronto area.  Latitude fabricates  natural stone such as Granite and Marble from reputable suppliers. You don't need to worry about the quality of your stone, we only deal with the best. 
We work with all the leading Quartz companies such as  Caesarstone, Silestone, LG Viatera, Hanstone, Compac, and Diamastone. We will also fabricate acrylics such as Corian, Hi Macs and Staron.  
Customers can purchase their Kitchen countertops & Bathroom vanities directly or through our vast dealer network. We work with dealers all over Southern and Northeastern Ontario. To find a dealer near you check our website, as well for remnants and special offers visit our website www.latitudecountertops.com and view our blog at blog.latitudeonline.ca 
We meet the needs of our Builders, renovators and Home owners throughout Ontario.

To find a dealer close to you please visit our website.

services: Latitude works on a Guaranteed 8 -10business day turnaround from countertop template to installation.  We digitally template all Kitchen and Bathroom countertops and can do so without removing your exiting countertop.  We also provide a countertop removal and or disposal service if you need to have your existing countertop removed before the new one is installed.  Our template process will take from 30min to 1.5hours.  Following the template, we will fabricate your custom countertop and return to install it within 10 business days, guaranteed.  Installations can take from 1 to 4 hours depending on the size of the project.   We also alter existing natural stone and acrylic countertops to fit new appliances.

profile:
What You Can Expect from Bravura Kitchens
Bravura Kitchens was established in 2005 by Ravi Thind, a lifelong woodworker who was urged on by family and friends to turn his hobby and passion into a full-time career. Taking a leap of faith, custom woodworking was soon added to Ravi’s list of renovation services and soon enough, Bravura Kitchens was born.

Since woodworking was something we always did for fun and enjoyment, we are able to bring a level of precision and care to every job that others lack. At Bravura Kitchens, we are not only interested in providing you with the cabinetry you need, but also with cabinetry you’ll love to look at and use. Form is equally as important to us as function and no job is ever turned away for being “too difficult” or “impossible.”


BRAVURA KITCHENS
Quality Cabinetry. Fine Design. Excellent Workmanship.
Bravura Kitchens is a top-quality kitchen and bathroom renovation specialist. We have been remodeling and designing custom kitchens and baths in the GTA for over 20 years and have developed a reputation for excellence and value.

We take great pride in our work, using only the finest materials and a strict attention to detail. Your home is your castle and we want you to feel like royalty every time you step foot in it.


WHAT WE DO
We specialize in kitchen and bathroom designs, but we also do custom renovation projects, so if you have a woodworking need, give us a call! We want you to be involved in your renovation, that’s why we work closely with each homeowner on their project. From initial concept and design through construction and the finishing details, we invite you to be intimately involved in your bathroom or kitchen remodeling project. Our #1 goal is to exceed your expectations, which we do through a combination of quality materials, exceptional design, and expert craftsmanship.

 

WHAT MAKES US THE PERFECT FIT?
High-Quality Craftsmanship:
We don’t believe one size fits all. Every cabinet is custom-made to your specifications, creating one-of-a-kind kitchen or bathroom.

Over 20 Years of Experience:
GTA Homeowners have trusted us with their kitchen and bathroom renovations for more than 2 decades. Most of business comes from returning customers and referrals. We let our craftsmanship to speak for us! As a company, we are small enough to make our clients a big deal and big enough to meet their every need.

Family Owned and Operated:
Bravura Kitchens is a family owned and operated business. Every project is special and receives our personal attention. Quality control is implemented at each step of the process to ensure customer satisfaction.

Flexible Appointments:
We meet with clients when timing is right for them. We offer flexible hours to accommodate all clients, which extend to evening and weekends.


We're social here:
https://www.facebook.com/bravurakitchens/
https://www.instagram.com/bravurakitchens/

profile:
JH Kitchen Cabinets offers factory direct, custom made designs to suit your needs. Unlimited coloring options, no pre-staining, you are not limited to what has been prefabricated. Visit our showroom, JH Kitchen Cabinets uses UP to 40% shine coating, to bring your kitchen to life while prefabricated companies only uses 10% coating. 

Prefabricated kitchen companies only offer standard sizes, JH Kitchen Cabinets provides our customers with limitless design options. Cold weather shrinks and dries prefabricated materials but our high quality wood is resistant to the harshest Canadian Winters. 

JH Kitchen uses Canadian made products, to ensure the best quality for our customers. 

Our Two Locations:

profile:
Hi, My name is Barbara. I'm thrilled to announce that I'm celebrating 18 years of Decorating & Designing.

Barbara Nyke Interiors & Design is a residential interior design & decorating studio.  We design custom kitchens, baths and décor for busy professionals primarily in: Toronto, North York, Etobicoke, Mississauga, Caledon, Vaughan, Richmond Hill, The Beach and Scarborough.  For projects located elsewhere, we are delighted to take our designs beyond the GTA.

Here's an article about "Why You Need to Hire a Kitchen Designer" - I'm the featured kitchen designer in the article.. Please copy & paste: https://blog.homestars.com/expert-opinion-why-need-kitchen-designer/

To get your project started, book a 2-hr kitchen design consultation with me.  I'll give you a comprehensive set of preliminary design recommendations including space planning, how to maximize counter space, cabinetry design, estimated project costs and more. Then we're ready for Step 2 of the NIKKA DESIGN process.

--------------

Barbara was a guest designer on "The Property Brothers" TV show.
 
I helped to redesign and renovate the entire main floor of a suburban 1960s home that included: the foyer, dining room, living room, kitchen and family room. Please see our Gallery for some photos.
 
"We design exceptional spaces. Our desire is to serve our valued and respected clientele by transforming how you live and work.  We rely on experience, expertise and impeccable integrity to complete projects on time, on budget and with stunning results".
 
Our Services Include:
In-Person Consultations

Interior Decorating

Space planning

Computer drafting

Art Consulting & Custom Framing

profile:
Custom Kitchen Interiors with Premium Service.
------------------------------------------------
Kakoz Kitchens & Custom Cabinetry is a family owned business with years of experience in kitchen design including creation, installation and remodeling. Kakoz Kitchens has one of the broadest and most versatile ranges of classic and contemporary kitchens on the market. We serve all of the Greater Toronto Area including Toronto, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Brampton, Hamilton, Etobicoke, Scarborough, North York, Vaughan, Ajax, Pickering, Whitby, Oshawa, Markham and Richmond Hill.
.
Wide Selection of Styles, Cabinetry and Doors ______________________________________________________________________
Whether you are considering timeless simplicity, classic elegance or Victorian style, you will be delighted by the range of beautifully handcrafted options available to you at Kakoz Kitchens. In solid wood with thoughtful detail evident in every piece of cabinetry, the practicality of the designs enhances the modern technology within. We also offer a large variety of door styles, which all come in a wide range of woods. We will make your kitchen the heart of your home, a place where you will enjoy creating meals and socializing with your friends and family.

profile:
Dorval Homes is a high-end custom building company specializing in new homes, additions, and renovations in the Greater Toronto Area.  With over 10 years in the GTA, our rich heritage isn’t to be understated – and discerning homeowners and leading architects have come to rely on Dorval Homes for exquisite attention to detail and comprehensive knowledge of master home-building.  

The happiness of our customers is our singular goal.  Creating joy in our customers’ experience is the byproduct of combining our superior building systems with a rugged moral code emphasizing honesty and fairness.  

Dorval Homes is highly conscious of a project timeline and budget and has proven methods for delivering on both.  These advantages are conveyed to each client through a dedicated team and a highly transparent project management process.  

Additionally, Dorval Homes' 3-year warranty reflects our higher level of service after the job is done, as well as confidence in our craftsmanship.  This means that if there is any follow-up work, or request, long after a project has been completed, we promptly take care of it.  Think of us as your long-term, accountable partner.

profile:
With over 30 years experience, Masonry Doctors are a leading masonry contractor in Toronto. Our services include Chimney Builds & Repairs, Roofing, Guttering, All Masonry Services, Patios, Walkways, Stairs, Steps, Basement & Foundation.

Browse through Masonry Doctors latest masonry, chimney, and concrete projects. Take a look at our recent work and see for yourself the quality of work we provide. Contact us today for a FREE estimate!

Do you need to have your existing outdoor masonry features repaired? Turn to the professionals from Masonry Doctors for all  your masonry restoration needs.

Protect your landscape from the effects of flooding by having custom-designed retaining walls installed by our professionals. Call for your service.

If you love spending time outdoors, a patio is a must-have feature for your home. The team from Masonry Doctors can custom-design a patio for you.

The skilled masons from Masonry Doctors can install decorative stairs for your landscape. We can also repair your damaged steps. Call for more details.

Whether you have damaged concrete or a cracked foundation, the team from Masonry Doctors can repair it for you. Get 15% OFF our services.

Veneer facades and pillars can transform the appearance of any property. Trust us to upgrade your home with quality pillars and columns. Request a call back today!

Rely on the professionals at Masonry Doctors for all of your foundation and basement repair needs. Hire us today and get 15% OFF all our foundation or basement services.

Whether you need chimney rebuilding, repairing, or repointing services, Masonry Doctors does it all. Contact us today for a FREE estimate.

Our experts work with all roofing material and installation types. So, whether your roof is flat or pitched; on a home or commercial property, we are your best choice.

profile:
THE KITCHEN IS THE FOCAL POINT OF ANY HOME.
It serves as a nucleus of food preparation, an informal meeting place and often has a unique look to set it apart from the other rooms in your home. 
If you are considering a new kitchen or an upgrade, Marca can help you with a variety of kitchen designs and ideas.
We also design and build for all cabinetry and millwork required throughout the home.

Our design team will assist you to create a unique design specifically tailored to achieve the exact look you are envisioning. 
From material selections to colours we will be there to provide you with plenty of options to ensure we capture the design perfectly. 
As we are building cabinets of beauty and functionality we believe it is very important to match this with top of the line hardware, which we offer a lifetime warranty on.

Give us a call - (416) 688-3447

profile:
Renovations For You By Us, says it all. We take your home and make it everything you want it to be!

Our step-by-step renovation planning will guide you through the entire process, from our initial design, all the way through to completion. You will provide us final sign-off on your Floor Plan, Selection List, Payment Summary and Renovation Contract before we begin. We encourage your input, ideas and guidance every step of the way!

We specialize in all things residential.  Whatever you're looking for: basement, kitchens, bathrooms, bedrooms, tiling, framing, drywall, flooring; top to bottom, we will have your home looking it's absolute best!

With three equal managing partners, you have three primary contacts for your renovation. You can speak with any of us, at anytime, 7 days a week. If one of us is with another client, simply call or email one of our other partners and we will get back to you asap.

Darryl, our Chief Contractor and Design Operator, offers over a decade of contracting experience.  With expertise in all things residential contracting, he will be at your home every day working and overseeing the entire process.  Darryl's motto is simple: I'm building it like I'm living in it.

Jason, our Chief Executive Officer, has been a Realtor for the last 18 years and also grew up in the industry, allowing him to offer the guidance and advice to help your home not only look its best, but also worth as much as possible.

Kate, our Chief Administrator and Design Consultant, runs the day-to-day operations of the entire company, but also provides a much needed different perspective for designs and plans.  She will be there to guide you from the beginning stages of planning, right through to the last nail being hammered.

No hidden costs, ever! The price we give you in our Renovation Proposal and Renovation Contract will not change unless you make an amendment after each is signed.

Additionally, we ask that you hold back 10% of the final cost of the entire project for 45 days after completion. We do this because we stand by our work, we know it is of the highest quality, and we want you to be 100% sure you are just as happy with our work, as we are when we finish.  That last 10% isn't due until the 46th day after your renovation is complete, so that you have time to enjoy our work and see it's quality.  If for any reason there is a deficiency with our work, we will be back within 48 hours to remedy it!
services: Residential Contracting, Basement Finishing, Basement Renovations, Kitchen renovations, Kitchen Countertops, Kitchen Cabinets, Complete Kitchen Renovation, Bathrooms, Creating Additional Bathrooms, Plumbing, Tiles, Relocating Bathrooms, Storage in Home, Garage Storage, Flooring, Drywall, Mudding, Framing.
brands: We choose only the best, and high quality brands for our jobs and tools.  We welcome your input if you have any preferences, and will of course offer our expert opinions if requested.
specialities: Any and all residential renovations
diplomas: Western University, Brock University, McMaster University, Mohawk College
name: Renovations For You By Us Inc.

profile:
Hello Viewer! 

We offer full turn key solutions for interiors and exterior renovations for a variety of building types. Working at a range of scales, from custom renovation projects for residential market to adaptive reuse of small commercial buildings. The team lists beauty, practicality, and social and environmental sustainability as essentials for ‘healthier and happier buildings’.  


We specialize in the design and renovation management of a variety of spaces which can differ in size and function.  It is through our free consultation that  a picture is painted on what your project and budgetary requirements are.   We will hold your hand as tight as you require and ensure that we listen to your wants and needs.  Once we have a clear picture of scope and budget, our team will estimate and design your space for you accordingly with years of experience and education backing our every decision.   


There is no project to small and no renovation project to large for us to handle.  
-We work with a variety of agents who have clients moving into their new 2 story properties or condos which have very tight time lines.  We have accomplished full 3 story (including basement) renovations in 5 weeks flats when necessary.  
-We have many recurring clients which use our services for each challenge they face.  If you aren't ready to do a full project in a single swing,  we can help you break down the project into proper stepping stones to spend where necessary and when necessary. 


We are a phone call or email away and would be honored to work with you.

profile:
WELCOME TO ZGGLTD
Located in Mississauga, Ontario and Big Sky, Montana ZGGLTD is a trusted name in commercial and residential architectural millwork installation and has been known by many for our quality installation, attention to detail, reliability and commitment to customer satisfaction.
ZGGLTD was founded in 2009 by Fadil Selimi with more than 30 years experienced in woodworking trades in shop and installation. 

As 2021 we are member in a good standing of AWMAC Ontario Chapter.

WHY CHOOSE US

ZGGLTD offers a wide range of professional architectural millwork installation services for commercial, properties across Canada and USA. The team of experienced millwork professional installers at ZGGLTD are standing by to serve your needs and make your business stand out with quality woodwork.

As a company ZGGLTD is focused on providing a higher level of services and support to meet and exceed your every expectation. Choosing ZGGLTD for your next project and you can rest assured that you will receive outstanding quality architectural millwork installation.

Here at ZGGLTD we have made it our mission to be the leading company for commercial architectural millwork installation, while maintaining integrity and professionalism by providing high-quality services at competitive prices. This means that we are committed to becoming the company you call when you want professional installation, knowledgeable advice, and a team who will listen and respond to your needs installation with every project.

profile:
The services we offer range from fresh decor updates to ground up new construction projects. We specialize in architectural finishes, space planning, light planning, art curation, and furniture and decor. Our clients appreciate the design process which is uniquely catered to them and their personalities and creates an elevated, more enjoyable, way for them to live or work in their space. We inspire our clients to reach outside the box and go further than they imagined by introducing creative and unique concepts.

HOW IT WORKS:

INTRODUCTION
Get in contact and we’ll send an online form that helps us understand your needs. We’ll also ask for any existing photos, plans, Houzz Idea books, and Pinterest board links. The more info you provide, the better!

PREPARATION
If you like, we’ll research ideas beforehand to review at the consult. Otherwise, we’ll develop ideas together with you “on the spot” when we meet.

THE CONSULT
Together with you (on a video conference or in our studio), we’ll review concepts and solutions to solve your design dilemmas. Whether your project is construction or decor related, the consultation is tailored to suit your needs.

FOLLOW UP
After the session, we’ll follow up with an email so you know where and how to get everything. If you need additional research afterwards, that can be available as well.
services:
1- E-DESIGN

(Emailed design Solutions)

2-CONSULTS

(One-off design consults)

3-CONSTRUCTION

(Full service design)

4-FURNITURE

(Selecting furniture & decor)

We are a construction company that deals with the construction of residential houses, complete renovation of residential houses, conversion of basements into residential units, and performing all work such as carpentry, landscaping, design methodologies including preparation of complete architectural plans and drawings, interior and exterior design of the residential units, as well as applying for municipal permit and licenses with the assistance of experienced and specialized employees encompassing construction engineers and architectural engineers throughout the GTA who are prepared to provide high-quality services in compliance with all standards and procedures.

profile:
Mark's General Renovations is an experienced, full service, home renovation company, who you can depend on. We've built a solid reputation for outstanding home renovations that blend seamlessly with our customers' surroundings.

Whether you're looking to do a kitchen remodel or a home addition, MGR can help you to evaluate which changes and upgrades are right for you - while keeping your budget in mind. We'll also help with design ideas, and color consultation. We take special pride in the responsiveness and innovation of our home renovations, as well as the high quality of materials, products, craftsmanship and personal service we provide our clients.


Perhaps you need to turn a spare room into a cozy personal space, or remodel a bathroom or a Finished Basement. Maybe you require a Home Addition, or remodeling of your entire home. We can turn the house you have into the home you want; a home designed and remodeled to make you happy.


We work with home owners in Etobicoke, Mississauga, Oakville, and Burlington. We stand behind our work, warranty every job, and go to great lengths to ensure that our clients are involved in the design process - every step of the way. Our commitment to you, our customer, is to do the very best job, on time, on budget - guaranteed.


For many of our homeowners; we are pleased to be their "contractor for life." We look forward to the opportunity of earning your trust, and your business.

profile:
BRIKS (Verb/ Noun/ Adjective): Bespoke. The Art of Luxury, Redefined.

BRIKS Design-Build Group is a TARION Registered Boutique Firm, specializing in Luxury New Build Construction of Custom Residences. We offer a Full range of the Best-in-Class General Contracting Services, including Transitional Renovation and Remodeling, Kitchen Designs, and Interior Design for Residential and Commercial Clients throughout Toronto.

The construction of your home may well be the largest investment you ever make, and is a huge undertaking. Simply put, this is not the type of job in which you can leave anything to chance. When you work with BRIKS Design & Build for your new and remodeling construction projects in the G.T.A., nothing will be overlooked. 
With our experienced team of renowned Architects, Interior Designers, Engineers, and Sub- Trades; we assure you that every detail of the construction project, from initial designs to site plans, and from construction to the materials sourced and used; will only be of the highest level of caliber that we work with. Whatever your vision of your new home may entail, our bespoke BRIKS team will ensure that it is fully realized.
As a leading Design-Build Firm in the G.T.A. , not only do we provide detailed site and architectural plans from some of the most reputable Architects in Canada, but we also assist with every part of the building process. From applying for permits, to laying the foundation, to your BRIKS Pre-Delivery Inspection; we are truly your one-stop shop for all your construction needs. 
Over the last 20+ years, we’ve earned the trust of residents throughout the G.T.A. region, and we would love an opportunity to earn your trust and business.

profile:
Falcon Contracting, a privately owned company founded in 1987 by John Giannopoulos, is among the leading general contracting companies serving the Greater Toronto Metropolitan region. As a "hands on" builder, Falcon Contracting has the experience, expertise, and, above all, the passion to deliver quality building solutions for a wide array of constrcution projects.

Owner and founder John Giannopolous, has an extensive background in the construction industry dating back to the early 1980s. Prior to establishing Falcon Contracting, John specialized for five years in window, door and storefront installations in high-rise, commerical and residential projects.

Since its inception as a one-man operation in 1987, Falcon Contracting has built a solid reputation for excellence and integrity in residential / commercial construction. This success can be attributed to John's dedication and passion for delivering superior performance value to clients based on exacting standards of quality, cost effectiveness and safety.

John's preconstruction know-how and techincal expertise in complex projects involving structural work, additions, 2nd story and custom homes enable him to anticipate project challenges and develop innovative solutions that ultimately fulfill and even surpass clients' objectives.

From concept to completion, Falcon Contracting has one single unwavering goal - customer satisfaction, 100% of the time.

Our services includes:

*Preconstruction Services: Design co-ordination, quality assurance, schedule control, cost analysis / budgeting, building systems analysis, site analysis /evaluation, client consultation, concept sketches, preliminary zoning investigation, production working drawings, obtain permits, zonign minor variance hearing preparation

*Project Planning: Developing preliminary critical path (project scheduling), design development / review, developing budget, trade procurement

*Construction Services: Design review & revision, building inspections, subcontractor coordination, budgeting and cost control, permitting and municipal approvals re: revision, contract administration, QA/ QC management, on site supervision

*Design/Build: Developing concept and design, producing working drawings, procurement management, subcontractor coordination, QA/QC management, cost monitoring and forecasting, safety inspections

*General Contracting: Contract administration, subcontractor prequalification & coordination, safety inspections, site management

*Renovation: Demolition and Disposal (Interior / Exterior), Excavations, Interiors, Rough and Finish carpentry, Masonry / Concrete work, Custom carpentry, Additions, second stories, custom homes, Landscaping, Kitchen & Bathroom Renovations, Basement Renovations

profile:
We are specialized in the production of fine kitchen cabinets, custom shelving, and high-end closet storage solutions . We are confident in the products we make, as well as the services we provide, on every project will suit your vision.

20 years of experience
Our 20 years of experience led to remodeling any kitchen, wall unit, home office, or walk-in closet style you like

Whether meeting with you and your family or collaborating with architects, contractors, and interior decorators, we’re here to help you define your scope of work and articulate a vision that’s uniquely yours.


The experienced design team will turn your vision into a reality detailed plan, creating custom solutions that blend form a function to fit all your family’s needs.

Build
Our designs of combining the old and the new world approach to the top of craftsmanship and that mean you can have the best rich design from both worlds for kitchens or bathrooms. We make every piece of cabinetry in our shop in Toronto, Proudly 100% Canadian-made. To this regard, we offer a warranty against defects in materials and/or workmanship for a period of two years under average residential usage.  

Our Values
We believe in building durable and functional cabinetry that will make things easy to store, easy to find, and easy to clean. By choosing to work with us you will get the real value for your investment and your cabinets will look as good up close as they do from a distance.

profile:
Founded in 1997, Maher Construction had become a full service management and construction company that includes new construction, interior fit-outs, construction management, interior design and architectural services.  Maher Construction has built a reputation on, and is committed to, working within the budget, ensuring that all projects are completed as per scope and schedule, and delivering the highest quality of work and service to our clients.

Each project is given personal attention by its principal Larry Maher. By maintaining an open line of communication with each member of the project and providing a leadership role throughout the construction phase, Maher Construction ensures the integrity and quality of each phase of the project. As a result, we are proud of our extensive list of repeat clients.

Our continued success is also due to our long-term relationships with clients, sub-trade contractors, consultants and employees.

A & A Home Repair Services was founded by Greg Cherebin.

Greg had his basment bathroom renovated a couple of years ago and felt he was not given the customer satisfaction that should come with using a reputable company. To make a long story short this effected Greg deeply and he decided to build a company to take care of clients and listen to what they are looking for.

Greg Cherebin is well rounded in customer service, and has an extensive knowledge of Basment and Bathroom renovations. 

The TEAM at A & A Home Repair Services focuses on customer satisfaction 100% We understand what makes a client happy. Honesty,Transperancy, Reliability Affordability and Quality.

These areas are key to having a successful business with happy clients.

Call for your free quote today.

We look forward to speaking with you have a great productive day.

Greg Cherebin 647 990 1278

profile:
If you are looking for a trusted contractor for all your renovation needs in Toronto, the search ends here.

RenoPros Home Services is the company to call for professional kitchen, bathroom, basement renovation and other home remodeling services in the Greater Toronto Area.

More Reasons Why Choose RenoPros Home Services?

- Serving the Greater Toronto Area since 1995
- A Trusted Family Operated General Contracting Business in Toronto
- Specializes in Kitchen, Bathroom and Basement Renovation Services
- Team of Highly Experienced Professionals
- High Quality and Cutting Edge Equipment
- Competitive Prices
- Free Estimates
- Your One Stop Shop’ Experience for Home Renovation and Remodeling Services
- Serves Homes, Kitchens, Bathrooms and Basements and other Properties in Toronto & Surrounding Areas

At RenoPros Home Services we are proud to offer a full range of home renovation and remodeling services in Toronto with a special focus on bathroom, kitchen and basement renovations. Your one stop shop’ experience starts here.

We are passionate about improving your space and providing you with your dream home in Toronto. If you are looking for experienced, professional, friendly and innovative individuals then you have come to the right place.

Since our inception in 1995, RenoPros Home Services has been one of the most preferred and recommended renovation and remodeling contractors in Toronto. Our commitment to provide impeccable workmanship at competitive prices makes our company become the trusted contractor of many homeowners in Toronto and surrounding areas.

Our team of highly experienced and trained contractors is knowledgeable and equipped with the latest tools and renovation practices to provide high quality and reliable bathroom, kitchen and basement remodeling services in the Greater Toronto Area.

profile:
Welcome to Arnold Homes Ltd.
Arnold homes Construction has been restoring and upgrading homes on the GTA for over two decade. We work collaboratively with our clients to create their vision with minimum hassle or fuss. Whether working on a deck or single room, renovating a whole house or building from scratch, we plan meticulously, provide clear and honest quotes and deliver on time and on budget.
We have a highly qualified team and work in partnership with reliable and talented sub trades including electricians, painters, ceramic tilers, dry wallers and plumbers. For projects, our core team is further enhanced with support from architects, structural engineers and kitchen and bathroom designers.
Improving your home is a major investment and Arnold homes Construction strives to give you real value for money and unmatched levels of high quality work and satisfaction.

profile:
Marvex Development Corp. is a full service construction company dedicated to building and improving commercial and residential structures according to client needs and desires.Located in Toronto, Ontario we service the GTA and surrounding areas. Our team is ready to give your space whatever updates it requires. We can provide a seamless experience from design to finishing touches, and everything in between. With a passion for building, we believe we can help you make your ideas a reality!


Commercial
Marvex Development Corp. can assist property managers and owners with professional and safe contracting services for lobbies, building envelopes, common elements, and retrofitting suites/units. We only use quality equipment brands and trusted materials to ensure our work is completed to the highest standards. We strive to provide great customer service and clear communication so you can understand the progress of your job at every phase. We are covered by WSIB and have $5M in liability insurance to satisfy the legal requirements for commercial spaces. Get in touch with us to learn more.


Building
Turn your project into the vision of your dreams by utilizing our full building services. Our experts will explain all your options, and answer all of your questions. Our team works closely with each client to make sure we’re meeting – and exceeding – expectations. From the designing/planning stages to final inspection, we can ensure your dream becomes a reality.  Get in touch for more information.


Renovation
We understand the importance of choosing a company that’s experienced, dependable, and affordable.  We have years of experience renovating kitchens and bathrooms, updating electrical and plumbing, redoing floors, installing new doors and trim, painting, decks, walkways and landscaping; just let us know how we can help!


Planning /Design
Need help getting started? Marvex Development Corp. can bring your ideas to life with full-scale drawings, provide you with 3D renderings, and organize a complete finishing materials list for your project. Whether your project needs full planning or just a little help with color selection, we can help.
name: Marvex Development Corp

profile:
Home Guru Inc. has evolved over the years from a cabinetry and smart home automation business into a full service renovation team. From kitchens, bathrooms, and basements to complete renovations involving structural work, our team is dedicated to providing our customers with a "no frustration renovation". 
We work tirelessly to be on time and on budget and we try to ensure that our quotes are realistic.
If you want a renovation done with integrity, care, and respect, Home Guru Inc. is  a contractor that you should consider. Our team is talented, friendly, and dedicated to your satisfaction. We love what we do and we would love the opportunity to quote on your next renovation project.
Home Guru is proud to be accredited with the BBB with an A+ rating.

profile:
Welcome to Di Fonzo 

With 25 years of experience, we are a solution based company with builders, designers, architects and engineers, and we bring the building permit to you to create your dream space. No job is too big or small.

From the planning and designing phase to the final touches and furniture fittings, we use high quality materials and up-to-date building methods. We aim to ease your apprehension that accompanies each building project while ensuring you get the top of the line craftsmanship and an excellent value for your money.

From adding a new porch to the house, to a full remodelling, to an open concept design in the kitchen, second floor additions and top-ups, to brick and limestone masonry including maintenance and installation of HVAC, we meticulously manage each detail of the project.

profile:
Mark's General Renovations is an experienced, full service, home renovation company, who you can depend on. We've built a solid reputation for outstanding home renovations that blend seamlessly with our customers' surroundings.

Whether you're looking to do a kitchen remodel or a home addition, MGR can help you to evaluate which changes and upgrades are right for you - while keeping your budget in mind. We'll also help with design ideas, and color consultation. We take special pride in the responsiveness and innovation of our home renovations, as well as the high quality of materials, products, craftsmanship and personal service we provide our clients.


Perhaps you need to turn a spare room into a cozy personal space, or remodel a bathroom or a Finished Basement. Maybe you require a Home Addition, or remodeling of your entire home. We can turn the house you have into the home you want; a home designed and remodeled to make you happy.


We work with home owners in Etobicoke, Mississauga, Oakville, and Burlington. We stand behind our work, warranty every job, and go to great lengths to ensure that our clients are involved in the design process - every step of the way. Our commitment to you, our customer, is to do the very best job, on time, on budget - guaranteed.


For many of our homeowners; we are pleased to be their "contractor for life." We look forward to the opportunity of earning your trust, and your business.

profile:
We are a company that operates in the sphere of making customized furniture for the kitchens and other rooms as well. We offer various kitchen cabinets design that differ in size, style, color and functionality and are adapted to the needs of our customers. The furniture we make is very reliable safe and can become the greatest decoration of your home. Our company employs talented designers able to create a beautiful and convenient furniture project and skilled crafts people that will implement those projects thoroughly and with highest quality.

Custom kitchen designs benefits:

The furniture is tailored to the sizes and angles of your kitchen so it’s guaranteed to fit in perfectly
Multiple custom kitchen ideas to select from
Talented designers will help you select the best option for your kitchen redesign and make the appropriate project for you
Our crafts people have extensive experience in producing custom furniture and are skilled enough to make things perfect
We have the showroom where you can take a closer look at different variant of kitchens and select the one that will suit your needs the best
Our experts order only safe and good quality materials for the furniture we make
Custom Made Kitchens will be adapted to the overall design of the house
We adapt to all taste, lifestyles and budgets of our customers
If you need a truly top-notch practical and good-looking custom kitchen design please allow our team of experts do everything possible to help you. We are happy to see our customers maximally satisfied with the results of our work. Our company in operating in the following cities: Toronto, Brampton, Mississauga, Richmond Hill and Oakville. If you are a resident of one of these cities please do not hesitate and contact us for more information. We’ll gladly answer all the questions you may have.

Some services that we offer are, Custom Kitchen Cabinets, Bathroom Vanities, Media and Entertainment Units, Home Office, Library Cabinets, Walk-in Closet, Custom Wineries, Bar Furniture, Laundry Room, Mudroom Cabinets, Wainscoting, Shower Glass Doors
